discrip: WeCraft will keep you happy along the way, hassle-free!
intro:
Welcome to WeCraft. 

We are formed out of professionals with international appreciation and intuitive understanding of website localisation.

pro1.paragraph: Initial meeting, ideation and check what you would like to make!

pro2.paragraph: Set up website development strategy, and finalise the prototype!

pro3.paragraph: Dig in step by step. Design the user experience and code the website!

pro4.paragraph: Final meeting, check whether you are completely satisfied or not!

project.heading: KESCA
project.paragraph: Korea Europe Standards Certification Association (KESCA) is an organisation supported by the South Korean government. WeCraft created a Ruby on Rails website to facilitate mass form applications to KESCA as part of their delivery of GDPR audit and certification.

block.heading: Discovery
block.paragraph: Initial meeting, ideation and check what you would like to make!

block.heading: Prototyping
block.paragraph: Set up website development strategy, and finalise the prototype!

block.heading: Design & Develop
block.paragraph: Dig in step by step. Design the user experience and code the website!

block.heading: Completion
block.paragraph: Final meeting, check whether you are completely satisfied or not!

subtitle: Your Creative Guru
title: WecrAft

block.heading: Tailored Website
block.paragraph: WeCraft provides a perfectly tailored solution for each individual or business. Tell us your aims, than we are all here for you

block.heading: Bespoke & Safe
block.paragraph: WeCraft will provide the targeted, most efficient solution for you to meet the goal with fully secured, SSL certified website

block.heading: Dedicated with perfection
block.paragraph: We are an experienced team, and you have a personal contact throughout the process to guide you through any queries

project.heading: DiversiTea
project.paragraph:
DiversiTea is a newly started artisan loose leaf tea curation startup. 

WeCraft worked with DiversiTea in order to make a stunning website that could help them spread the word and, in turn, allow more people to enjoy diverse teas.

text1.paragraph: Tell us about your new project. Email us below to get started on your journey.

text3.paragraph: 210 Portobello, Sheffield, South Yorkshire, S1 4DQ, United Kingdom

testimonial.quote: It was incredible. Shockingly so and I am still coming down from it...
testimonial.author: Emma Peel

testimonial.quote: Absolutely stunning service & really lovely tea
testimonial.author: Lesley Pyne

testimonial.quote: Always easy to deal with and the tea is so good
testimonial.author: Debbie Harkness
